text: Whisk {{flaxseed_meal}} with {{flax_water}} in a small bowl. Let thicken for 10 minutes.
In a large bowl, whisk {{oat_flour}}, {{baking_powder}}, and {{salt}}.
Whisk {{almond_milk}} and {{maple_syrup}} into the flax mixture, then stir in {{batter_fat}} if using.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed. Let the batter rest for 5 minutes to thicken.
Heat a skillet or griddle over medium-high heat and coat with {{pan_fat}}.
Pour about 1/4 cup batter per pancake. Cook until golden brown, flipping halfway through.
Serve with {{berries}}, a sprinkle of {{cinnamon}}, and {{whipped_topping}} if desired.
